body:
TorchGeo is the project I've been working on all summer that's prevented me from doing much Spack development or reviewing PRs 😛 

Once this is merged, we no longer need to maintain our own [spack.yaml](https://github.com/microsoft/torchgeo/blob/main/spack.yaml). I plan on updating the Spack package during each release, but probably won't update it between releases unless someone requests it.
title: py-torchgeo: add new package
